website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe cordless spin mop for the home. If you want power in your spin mop, look here.
pros: More effective than the average hand-wielded spin mop thanks to lithium-ion battery power
Tough mop pads remove filth from hardwood as well as laminate and other types of flooring
Use the trigger to control the amount of cleaner used
cons: It's pricey, and you could arguably get the same clean with a cheaper model, though it would take far more elbow grease

website_summaries.verdict: Toughest, most powerful spray mop on the market, from a trusted name.
pros: Comes with a set of reusable, machine-washable scrubbing and soft mop pads
Powered by a Lithium-ion battery that provides 20 min
Convenient handle makes it easy to move from room to room
cons: This model is expensive compared to other spray mops

customer_reviews.title: beware! of middle screws under rotating pads!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item back in February of 2020 and was loving it. Well today I used it and when I went to refill the cleaning solution I noticed huge scratches on my new hardwood floors. I looked under the pads and noticed one of the middles screws was coming out. This screw was digging into my floors and has made HUGE scratches all over. I have now been on line with Bissell for over 30 minutes with no answer!! BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne kobel

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean, more of a polisher for an already clean floor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cordless model. Does NOT clean my high gloss white floor tile. It is too weak and light for that. It kind of just floats across the floor. Cannot apply any pressure. I bought tougher, non-Bissell brand scrub pads which fit, but the machine is just too weak to clean the floor. Have tried all different types of cleaners- leaves swirl marks, and leaves the dirt. What it does do well is polish and "finish" the floor. After I scrub the floor with cleaner, and my old mop, I use the Spinwave and spray rubbing alcohol to remove the swirl marks, soap residue, and leave a streakless, polished finish.
customer_reviews.author: Christina C.

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's nice. But it quit on one side after only 4 months! No resolution as far as Amazon goes. Bissell doesn't have ways to contact customer service either.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME. Had no idea floors were so dirty, DON'T GET BATTERY POWERED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the battery powered but I think it's more of a gimmick. I thought you could use while plugged in. If you have easy access to plugs (like a vacuum) get the regular one with 22ft cable. It might not be as powerful as plugged in version and battery lasts 20 minutes (4 hours to charge) which is not enough for whole house. It does leave my floors a lot cleaner and with less effort than regular spray mop. GET ONE BUT SAVE THE $50 AND GET THE REGULAR VERSION. Also, use hot tap water and I'll try cleaning vinegar instead of solution next time. I'd also get an extra set of scrubbers with rough scrubbers for bathroom tile.
customer_reviews.author: D. nieto

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...Dull Haze on Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am not pleased with this. Used for the first time today on sealed hardwoods and my floors are now dull with some swirl marks around. Very disappointed..... Will try again (hopefully tomorrow) by spray9ing Bruce's or Bona first. At this point, I might have to clean them by hand to get the haze off.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Soluri

customer_reviews.title: love the machine, hate the battery/power supply
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bissell products for years. The Spinwave was awesome and convenient - love it for use on my older laminate floors. It was just great until it wasn't. Don't know if it's the battery or the power supply, but it has simply stopped charging. Can't use it. Bissell site says power supply out of stock. Now what? I would really, REALLY like to actually be able to use this. Have only had it 5 months, use has been light to moderate. Bissell, please help!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I'm able to polished my wooden floor like a professional. But I suggest to buy an extra rug. So when one is in the washer you have one ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: arnee

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Intuitive design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. One con: Getting deep cleaning replacement pads on correctly takes some serious effort or they rub against each other. Pros: Simple and intuitive build. The battery is adequate. After a full night's charge I was able to deep clean two rooms before it needed charged. The multipurpose cleaner has a pleasant smell and works well on both my hardwood and laminate floors. The unit has a well-placed handle to apply pressure for hard to clean spots. Haven't washed the pads yet but I expect they will hold up well as they look durable.
customer_reviews.author: OrganicSprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Makes my floors squeaky clean!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 5 months now since I got the cordless mop and I love it. We have a large 3-story house with hardwood floors and the mop really gets them spotless. My only suggestion would be if Bissel ever considered releasing a new version of it they could make the battery replaceable. Right now I cannot clean the whole house on one charge but I wouldn’t mind swapping a dead battery for a full one. It’s how I do it with my cordless vacuum and I wouldn’t consider the corded version anyway. I only put Bona in the detergent reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Gergana Vassilev

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding on hard floors but short run time.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is the best that I have found to date. It's easy to handle and maneuver, the cleaning solution does a great job and lasts a long time. However, Bissell erred in not giving it a long running battery or providing an extra battery. The battery dies before I can clean the whole house, which is an average size home. Further, it takes too long to recharge to make it practical on cleaning day. If your house is not too big or if you use it for small cleaning jobs, it is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: James Loss

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Defective - solution leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Here is my experience - Unboxed... put in concentrated solution + water, screwed the cap on tight. Put the tank on and clicked into place.... the entire tank drained all over the floor immediately. The only help online was to make sure the cap was on... duh.. that was no help. I'm guessing this is defective right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ano

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: This Bissell Spinwave is easy to use. I opted for the cordless version so that I wouldn't be tethered to a cord and could reach all areas. However, I have found that the battery life is not the greatest. In fact I would rather have the corded option at this point. The pads do not wash back to white, and are not recommenced to be bleached, therefore they look dirty/dingy even when clean. However, there is an option to purchase additional replacement pads.
customer_reviews.author: Afton Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why it took me so long to get this. I LOVE IT! My kids love using it and so does my tall husband. I hurt my back a few months and can’t walk or stand for too long, and found this guy to be so easy to use! He does all the work! Downside is that I can’t mop my entire 1000sqft all in one go- I do half of the house and then charge the battery for a hour and then do the rest of the house. Not a huge deal, but a slight inconvenience. But well worth not having to deal with wringing out a mop ever again!!!
customer_reviews.author: jannie

customer_reviews.title: The battery keep short time
customer_reviews.text: Charge 4 hours is full, but only can use 15 minutes. Each time charged full, I can only clean a dinning room. I used 2 days to charge and clean the whole house. Too bad battery, but it can clean the floor good. So I have to return it and reorder the other model which one with the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: A great timesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I somehow thought it was going to be a steam mop which it is not. But I am not disappointed. It does a great job. I love that it is cordless. It is easy to use and manuever around the floor. The rotating cleaning pads do a great job cleaning. The cleaning fluid it comes with is very effective. I can easily clean all my hard floors within the battery charge time. I do charge it between every use. The bottom line is, I get all my floors clean quickly and efficiently with this mop.
customer_reviews.author: OMEvans

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy! Super fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy! I can mop 1300 sq ft in less than 20 mins. The first time I used it I noticed that only the edges of the round pads were dirty. Then I added 2 small round paper towel pads under them before attaching back on - this endured that all of the pads were in contact with the floor. If you think you may need to do the same, just make sure that the paper towel padding does not touch any of the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Needs longer life battery!  Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but the battery doesn’t last long enough. Cleans about 3/4 of the hardwood before it just stops and needs to be recharged. We only have hardwood in the living room and hallway. Have to plug it back in right in the middle of floor cleaning. It did do a good job, our floors are not high traffic so I just wanted something easier on my back, and it certainly is. Easy to use, just wish I could get the whole room done!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Illert

customer_reviews.title: Just very basic clean
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little more than what it has give me. It does its work. But it doesn’t give the hard floor a very deep cleaning. For example if I spill milk on the floor and let it dry and use this mop it won’t take away the stain of the milk. I have a mop it serval times. So if you just want like a quick clean it will do the work. It was a little heavy when I lift it up the change the cleaning pad
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Spinning moo.
customer_reviews.text: Love this spin cleaner! No pressure needed the spinning pads do all the work. Pads picked up a lot of dirt! Only thing fully charged only last 20 minutes. But did buff up nicely with wax shine!
customer_reviews.author: whitedove

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING  just after 4 months of use...
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of use, one of the two wiper motors completely stopped working and no longer spinning... So sad to see how unreliable this product is....
customer_reviews.author: Iserjio

customer_reviews.title: Battery run time is low and slow to charge
customer_reviews.text: There's enough battery life to do my kitchen twice over but not enough to do the rest of the house. My wife couldn't wait an hour or so to charge and i caught her pushing it like a mop to finish up our floors. eventually, i'll open it up and replace the battery with one of my larger RC battery for a longer run time and quicker charger.
customer_reviews.author: -a|ex

customer_reviews.title: Just AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy is all the cleaning operation with this machine. The machine does all the necessary pressure on the floor to remove the mess, I don't have to make any effort, just guide it. The only thing I don't like, is the battery life, I have a big master bedroom and living room, I have to charge it after I clean those areas before I can start cleaning the rest of the house. It will be nice if I could have an extra battery charging.
customer_reviews.author: Giny161718

customer_reviews.title: Must have for busy moms!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the perfect mop for years. I love my steam mop but hate having to deal with the cord so I decided to try the cordless Spinwave. I work full-time and have two small children and literally can mop every single day now! I grab the mop off the charger and off it goes. It is super easy to maneuver and I feel like it cleans well. The water tank is huge too. So pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Dark wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: Mine did have an issue with the handle clicking in place but Bissell sent me a new one right away. I modified using the faulty handle at first thinking I would eventually figure it out so I did have a chance to test it. This machine dramatically improved footprints and smudges on dark wood floors. The cleaning solution smells nice. I do wonder if a water and vinegar solution would clean the floors even better. This definitely avoided having to have the floors professionally cleaned and the unit is much easier on the body than mopping.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans well and is very easy to maneuver. We clean about 1,000 sf of hardwood floors (takes about 30 min) and the battery is still gong strong. After about 5 uses, it is still much more fun mopping than our old corded steam mop. Not having a cord to deal with or having to continually load a manual mop makes the chore much less taxing.
customer_reviews.author: VanW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the cleaner provided with this machine on your hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: This machine made cleaning my glazed ceramic tile easy but left my hardwood floors full of streaks and very dull. You can see th “circles” made with the pads. I read one review that someone used their old hardwood cleaner by just spraying it on the floor and then running the machine over it.i wish I had read that before using the cleaner (that says it’s for hardwood floors) that came with the machine. I am so disappointed 😥
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: The best kept secret in wood flooring maintenance!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my I am in heaven! Bought the cordless only way to go. No more wet mopping for me! Dries quickly no streaks no real assembly issue. The best kept secret. Wasn’t fully charged but couldn’t wait. When charged will finish floors then use a Bona floor polish
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I got this mop today and have used it for a total of 20 minutes and it will no longer spin. I am extremely frustrated and have done all of the troubleshooting suggestions listed in the manual. If I could give this negative stars, I would. Total piece of junk and now I have to mess with returning a brand new LARGE item. Waste of time and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bower

customer_reviews.title: No more cinderella...
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! We have a hardwood house, and I've always done the hands and kneepad scrub (dogs and kids). No longer needed! Fast, easy, and battery life is fine(a full charge does one floor, and by that time i need a break anyway!) With tough stains(around dog food bowl) I do an extra spray and go over a few more times and its done. Floors have never looked better!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: EVERYBODY RAVED ABOUT HOW CLEAN MY KITCHEN FLOOR LOOKS !!!!!!LOVE IT !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING CLEANS THE FLOOR AS GOOD AS GRANDMA USTE TO !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie P. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Dies fast
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use but the battery doesn’t last very long and dies out quickly. After charging for 4 hours the cordless battery only lasts about 20 minutes. It takes very long to charge for it to be used for such a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda diaz

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a new house that has bamboo floors and two boxer dogs, one who is old and sometimes has problems with bowl and bladder. No issues with this thing around. Cleans well, easy to use. Get some extra pads to keep you cleaning and polishing I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: daniel balchen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to clean my hardwood floors which are high gloss. This thing is fantastic . As my floors are finished in a high gloss finish , I cannot you the scrub pads on them, but I ordered the extra buffer pads I can clean them to a super shine with very little effort . Easy to use ... floats effortlessly across the floor . I do use my Bona hardwood floor cleaner with it though , no the cleaner supplied .... and I've had no issues . Love this little thing!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: POS after 7 Months
customer_reviews.text: 7 months and one side won't work half the time. Read warranty which basically is worthless because the wear from regular usage invalidates it and you have to pay postage on it to send it in and back. I wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: James Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best Hard Floor Mop!!
customer_reviews.text: Effortless. Pads were so dirty only going back and forth once or twice on my sealed hardwood. I have had another brand of vibrating hard floor mop but it just didn’t clean like this one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MGWikiWiki

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Six months after I bought it, one of the rotating discs broke. Ok, bought the replacement part and replaced it, not an expensive fix. Two months after the first issue, the water started leaking. Threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a steam mop....be careful
customer_reviews.text: I had a coded steam mop, since I moved I was looking for a cordless one. But this is not a steam mop, it doesn’t clean well
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Why beep for spray but not battery level
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job of cleaning my ceramic tile and wood laminate. Stubborn spots were gone after a few seconds of going over. Was thrilled how quiet the mopping is yet a beep everytime you use the spray??? So annoying and not needed. Was only able to clean 4 1/4 rooms before battery ran out. Overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: But it - you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is phenomenal. It is super easy to use, lightweight, and has a battery life long enough to do my whole house. The swivel makes this super easy to maneuver and get to hard to reach spots. The floors feel wonderfully clean afterwards. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Santilli

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING after 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months! One of the spinner doesn’t spin. Even when it worked for the 4months it doesn’t deep clean. It’ll leave a film on the floor. It’s something to use in between steam cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kbeehugh

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mop for several months now and I think it's a great product for the price point. It does a good job on my faux wood floors and moves with ease. It's not heavy or a burden to use. You just want to be careful that you don't step on it or bump it too much into the walls or anything, or else the spinner will crack. Which brings me to my second point, excellent customer service! I contacted them and they were able to solve my issue immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mop --- Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is amazing and has made my life easier. I use this all the time and wouldn't go back to all the other floor mops. Worth the price for cordless and so glad I bought the extra pads. This mop does the work for me especially since all I have to do is guide it. Easier on my joints and back.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice if you hate mopping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mop because we love our cordless vacuum and hate mopping the floor. I swear, in the 3 weeks we’ve had this mop, we’ve already mopped the floor more than we have in the past year. It cleans WAY better than a swiffer wetjet and does not require extensive set up or clean up like a traditional mop and bucket (yes, I consider that extensive...). The floors dry quickly and look fantastic. It is heavier than I thought and does require two hands to steer, but it’s the only way I’ll ever mop again.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this thing. It makes mopping so easy and actually fun. Accidentally ordered the corded one at first and swapped it for this one. The cordless option is so convenient and makes it super easy to grab out to clean up spills and messes. Since the pads spin, if you simply let the mop hover over a tough spot for a few seconds, it gets it right off, no problem. Seriously loving this and so happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So clean!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is AMAZING! So easy to assemble and use. I was shocked at how good my floors looked after. I have had issues finding a mo that doesn’t streak. I love bissell products and stand behind them always. However, the only downfall of this product would be the battery life my house has hard floors throughout and it’s only about 1500sqft and that was enough for the battery. But they look so good and it was very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but wish battery can last longer
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice stuff but not clean well with corner and always have to recharge battery after use it ,twice already I got cut of my cleaning due to battery run out
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: waste of money an time
customer_reviews.text: I been excited to get this but it comes in today i plug it up let it charge for the 4 hours it states go to use it an its a waste of time an money. Do not clean nor does the battery last. Maybe 10 mins of mopping battery dies. Needless to say im back to square one an upset with this.. getting refund an hoping to find a mop that really works an cleans
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: The Battery Should Be A Lot Better
customer_reviews.text: Would be perfect if it had a longer battery life or had the ability to change to a second battery. I have a cordless vacuum with a led light and wish the mop had the same.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a few months and it leaks a lot. Cant get a refund or exchange. Bissell doesn't cooperate and cant get a hold of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: brad smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it doesn't...
customer_reviews.text: thrilled to buy the mop 4 months ago and have been using it happily almost daily since. However, very recently it started to make cracking sound and the pads seem to lose its spinning capacity. Can't figure out why the short life span. Will find out if the 1 yr warranty is real
customer_reviews.author: arrela

customer_reviews.title: Great brand. Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love how long the cleaning mixture lasts per container. It runs a good time on one charge. I love that I can bleach and was the pads. Definitely don’t have any buyers remorse. My three year old loves to help me with it also. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nicole Kamstra

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Bissell Spinwave
customer_reviews.text: all i can say, it is the best product that i loved after using it, its worth every penny, and i love it that my purchase also has a good cause, to save Homeless Pets. i'll definitely recommend this product. dont think twice about it.
customer_reviews.author: Alina A.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry I didn't purchase one of these sooner. This is easy to use and does a great job cleaning, no cord to get wrapped up in makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Make mopping so easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and light weight. I do not even have to do much, the mop is very smooth and easy to maneuver, even a 10 year old can mop the floor efficiently. We have been recommending this product to everyone we know because we love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Ly Tai-Shan

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Spinwave for a year now and am very happy with my purchase! I have RA and tire easily - not to mention the fact that I hate cleaning - but using the Spinwave is great. I have to agree with the reviewers who said the self propeller feature makes cleaning kind of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Super amazing product. Highly recommend@
customer_reviews.text: Just a super amazing product..love love it! I have hardwood 90% of my house and love using this to clean hardwood floor. Does it job, cleans floor well. Love the cordless so easy to maneuver. Its vert quite.
customer_reviews.author: Kaisersoesce

customer_reviews.title: Legit best thing i ever Bought!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE This thing more than any other cleaning tool in my house. We have very hard water as we are on a well and i can say this thing gets all those hard water spots up off the floor. It lasts to clean the whole house and is so easy to use. I recommend it to EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.author: The Gees Rural Life

customer_reviews.title: Not great like I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work that well, it doesn’t do a good job. I mopped my house and there was a lot of spots that were still on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Just received this, I fully charged it and the battery didn’t last to mop my whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Celia G. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: There's better options
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wish it had the ability to pick up debri instead of only polishing the floors. In my opinion it's over priced after using this don't buy get something that's more bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Marks

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it until it breaks. Less than 90 Day Mop Life.
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 2 months. Loved it when it worked. Now it’s collecting dust in a corner. Hoping to somehow through someone get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Giving it five stars even though the battery only lasts for about 30 minutes or so. Yes you have to wash the pads after every use. I am really impressed with how clean my laminate floors get. I can get about 1300 sqft done on a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Live your best life
customer_reviews.text: Top ten purchases of the year. If u do t have a cordless vacuum and mop, u arent living your best life
customer_reviews.author: Taylor m.

customer_reviews.title: The floor feels very clean. Takes no effort at all.
customer_reviews.text: My first review on amazon ever.... This makes life easier, has to be on the list of every newly weds registry. I washed the floors a week ago, my floors are very clean, I don’t think humans can do such good job. The floor feels very clean. Takes no effort at all. I will never go back to old fashion way. Thank you Bessel.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Roizis

customer_reviews.title: makes cleaning easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this product makes my mopping much easier and more cleaner than the manual mop out there although i wish the battery life is much more longer otherwise its a good product
customer_reviews.author: Jose Aurellano Jr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Received Mop same say I ordered, upon receiving it I charged it and did all my ceramic tile floors. It was clean and no streaks. Key is not to spray too much cleaner. I did buy extra pads so the second pass I wasn't using the dirty pads. I bought this for when we clean our church tile and works wonderful. I have received many great comments. I would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Maravilla

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to handle and does a great job cleaning up my bulldog’s slobber. I know, yuk, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective wood floor cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and requires very little effort to get a good deep clean. Far better than swiffers. Only complaint is the power sometimes causes it to snap one way or another if you don’t maintain a good grip. It feels like it might wear over time, but have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: DenBro

customer_reviews.title: Seems  too light weight to  really deep clean or buff.
customer_reviews.text: I think it work better if it was not so light weight. I had pads missing and the battery only last a few mintues. I had some other pads that size so I tried to make those work but I am returning it as soon as I can get a box and get it boxed up, I do like the quiet , cordless way it seems to be when running. You can hardly hear the motor, The machine I got looked like new just had some problems. Others may be fine,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performs good
customer_reviews.text: Performs good on engineered wood, but don't expect deep cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Jumoon

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but not for the long run
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this item 5 stars, and probably would have if I wrote this review within the first week. But after a month of regular use every other day, the right “spinner” is already acting funky. I love the concept and style of this machine, but unfortunately the one I’ve received wasn’t built to last.
